text:
.........
This could've been done a little sooner...
Chiyuki seems to be doing well.

Ah, Producer-san!
So you were here to check on things.

Haha, I didn't notice.
That means you were really focused.

You checked every nook and cranny
of the training camp facility...

And thanks to you informing everyone,
we can fully focus on our lessons.

I mentioned wanting everyone to concentrate, didn't I?
But I also wanted you to focus, Chiyuki.

I see.
Hehe, thank you very much, Producer-san!
